articles.title: Rahane asks for movie, web series suggestions on Twitter, gets brutally trolled - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ajinkya Rahane was on the received end of some brutal trolling on Twitter as fans lashed out at him for his poor form.
articles.content: Having recently lost his place in the Indian team due to poor form, Ajinkya Rahane seems to be taking his time to get back to cricket. Currently back at his home, Rahane took to Twitter to ask fans f… [+2319 chars]

articles.title: 50.68! McLaughlin runs earth-shattering world 400m hurdles record on day eight in Oregon | REPORT | WCH 22 - World Athletics
articles.description: The 22-year-old US superstar broke through an inconceivable, unfathomable barrier of 51 seconds for running one lap of the track and clearing 10 barriers
articles.content: Hands up if you saw this one coming. Not so much that Sydney McLaughlin would win gold in the 400m hurdles, adding the world title to her Olympic gold, and not just that she would break her own world… [+9614 chars]

articles.content: The 2022 Commonwealth Games are scheduled to take place in Birmingham (England) from 28 July to 8 August. In this episode, host Mihir Vasavda joins Indian Express Shivani Naik to discuss Indias prosp… [+259 chars]

articles.title: India nearly undone by late batting wobble | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: In an attempt to go big in the last 15-odd overs, India ended up losing the plot a little to finish with a total that was just about sufficient to secure a 1-0 lead in the series
articles.content:
Dhawan scored a half-century but his dismissal was the start of a shaky end to India's innings that finished on 308 for 7 ©AFP
